node.title: It's not Squid Game but 10 people are pitted against each other for cash … and they're teachers
node.alt: A group of people wearing helmets compete for money in a mat on the floor.
node.description: Footage of a "Dash for Cash" promotion, held during a hockey game in the US state of South Dakota, has prompted online outrage and sparked a national debate about school funding.
node.content:
["It's been likened to Squid Game: Teachers\u00a0pitted against one another, frantically scooping up dollar bills to help pay for classroom supplies.", "Footage of the \"Dash for Cash\" promotion, held during a hockey game in the US state of South Dakota, has prompted online outrage and sparked\u00a0a national debate about school funding.", "Here's how we got here:", "
Hang on, what happened?
", "The Sioux Falls Stampede \u2014 a United States Hockey League team \u2014\u00a0launched the \"Dash for Cash\" promotion on Saturday,\u00a0local time.", "Organisers dropped $US5,000 ($7,047) on a mat on the centre of the ice, before 10 teachers \u2014 who were randomly selected from more than 30 applications \u2014 dropped to their hands and knees, scrambling to collect the cash in front of a live audience.", "Although the Stampede said the event was meant as a charitable gesture to help fund local teachers and classrooms, it didn't quite go the way they expected.", "The event was recorded by a local reporter, who shared it online \u2014 and it\u00a0didn't take long for social media users to draw comparisons to the Netflix series Squid Game, where desperately indebted Koreans agree to compete to the death for a cash prize.\u00a0", "\"Squid game was supposed to be a unrealistic dystopia,\" one Twitter user wrote.", "\"Not [on] a Sunday in South Dakota.\"", "
How have organisers responded?
", "As you may have guessed by now, they've since apologised.", "In a written statement, the Sioux Falls Stampede and CU Mortgage Direct \u2014 the bank that donated the money \u2014\u00a0said that, upon reflection, \"we can see how it appears to be degrading\".", "\"Although our intent was to provide a positive and fun experience for teachers, we can see how it appears to be degrading and insulting towards the participating teachers and the teaching profession as a whole,\" the statement said.", "According to the club,\u00a0the 10 teachers received at least $US500 ($704) apiece, adding it would funnel another $500 to each participant as well as to the remaining applicants who were not part of the event.", "
'Teachers shouldn't have to dash for dollars for classroom supplies'
", "South Dakota ranks 50th in the United States\u00a0for average teacher salary, according to the National Education Association.", "And while some critics believe the event was \"well-intentioned\", they note that it \"only underscores the fact that educators don't have the resources necessary to meet the needs of their students\".", "\"As a state, we shouldn't be forcing teachers to crawl around on an ice rink to get the money they need to fund their classrooms,\"\u00a0South Dakota Education Association's president, Loren Paul,\u00a0told local media.", "It was a sentiment echoed by the American Federation of Teachers (AFT), which labelled the event \"demeaning\".", "\"No doubt people probably intended it to be fun\u00a0but, from the outside, it feels terrible,\" AFT president Randi Weingarten tweeted.", "
So what's happening with the money?
", "The teachers, who all applied to participate in the event, get to keep it for their schools\u00a0as promised.", "Many said they would use the money to purchase items such as\u00a0flexible seating and document cameras to\u00a0upload lessons online.", "Speaking to local newspaper the Argus Leader, Alexandria Kuyper \u2014 a year 5\u00a0teacher \u2014 said the funds would go towards\u00a0smaller items, such as\u00a0holiday decorations for the classroom.", "\"I think it's really cool when the community offers an opportunity like this for things that educators, a lot of times, pay out of [their] pocket for,\" she said.", "ABC/Reuters"]
